name: Power-Failure in Space | Stromausfall im All
name_original: Power-Failure in Space | Stromausfall im All
description:
"Power failure in Space" is here!

You play as a cool-looking spaceship ...

...and must avoid Asteroids, but there is one problem:

As with your cellphone your power is LOW, so the light turns on and off and you can see only asteroids near you! 

Packed with dynamic music and the matching B & W design it's a must for all space-game fans!  So, have FUN!    ; )
